entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
